system.notes:
Possesses all Power Armour Subsystems (See Armour Upgrades) .+30 to Strength Characteristic. Can fire Heavy and Mounted Weapons one handed. Gain Auto-Stabilised Trait. 
Autosenses also act as an Auspex, Has Prot 35 Force Field with no Overload. Wearer Cannot Run or Dodge, suffers -20 to Agility. Takes a long time to Don/Doff, weapons are often affixed to it, coming from following list: Combi-Weapons, Power/Force Weapon, Storm Bolter, Storm Shield, Heavy Flamer, Assault Cannon, Cyclone Missile Launcher. Must spend at least 40 Requisition Points to arm. Roll once for Power Armour History.
